Export.Routine: WWWCGI #include COMSYS ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; ANSETZEN CGI VARIABLEN ; ; Inputs : ; ; ByRef : ; ; Returns : ; ; History : ; 20-Oct-2008 FIS SR15824: set YLOCKKILL to force lock kill at form load ; when called from menu ; 18-Apr-2006 shobby SRBR014016: Merged WWWCGI2 and WWWCGI ; 10-Nov-2005 JW SR11904: Child user for popups ; 22-Sep-2005 RPW SR13306: Cleaned error prone code, copied to OBSWWWCGI ; 30.10.1999 DT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- write $$WWWCGI2($get(blnPOPUP)) quit FormURL(pstrForm,pstrKey="",pstrExtra="",pblnPopup=$$$NO) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Wrapper to new YKEY, pass in new form ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 26-Oct-2006 JW BR014262: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new YKEY,strHTML if $get(pstrForm)="" set pstrForm = YFORM set YKEY = pstrKey set strHTML = YAKTION_"EP=WWWFORM&YFORM="_pstrForm_pstrExtra_$$WWWCGI2(pblnPopup) quit strHTML WWWCGI2(pblnPopup=$$$NO) ;WWWCGI;DT;ANSETZEN CGI VARIABLEN;30.10.1999 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; ANSETZEN CGI VARIABLEN ; ; LINK BEISPIEL: ; write "" ; write strLink ; write "" ; ; ANHAENGEN STANDARD VARIABLEN ; "|" = HILFSVARIABLE BEI NETSCAPE ; ; Params: pblnPopup - whether going to a pop up form ; ; ByRef : ; ; Returns : ; ; History : ; 18-Dec-2013 shobby CORE-291: YUSENAME ; 11-Feb-2011 GRF SR17659: Replace double quote characters in parameter ; string with corresponding HTML substring (") ; 20-Aug-2009 GRF SR16851: translated single quotes in VAR as well ; 20-Aug-2009 DWR SR16851: added ' to translate string, was causing ; errors with writing the link to the screen for popup ; windows using the value as a key. ; 17-Oct-2008 GRF $get(YANZ) not $get(YINZ) test in VAR ; 21-Dec-2006 JW SR14235: Changed floating blnPOPUP to param pblnPopup ; 11-Jul-2006 GRF Doco ; 18-Apr-2006 shobby SRBR014016: Included support for Popup windows. ; 08-Aug-2005 shobby Equivalent of WWWCGI but doesn't write directly to the ; screen. ; 30.10.1999 DT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strHTML ;if YBED["SHOBBY" if $get(YPARA)'="" for l=1:1:100 hang 1 set strHTML = "" if $get(YUCI)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YUCI="_YUCI ; Namespace if $get(YBED)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YBED="_YBED ; User ID if $get(YM)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YM="_YM ; Company if $get(YUSER)'="" { set strHTML = strHTML_"&YUSER="_$select(pblnPopup:$$GetChildUser^WWWUSER(YUSER),1:YUSER) } if $get(YTRAKT)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YTRAKT="_YTRAKT ;TRANSAKTIONSNUMMER if $get(YPARA)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YPARA="_YPARA ;PARAMETER if $get(YAENBER)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YAENBER="_YAENBER ;PARAMETER ÄNDERUNGSBERECHTIGUNG;DES FORMULARS if $get(YBACK)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YBACK="_YBACK ;RÜCKSPRUNG if $get(YKEY)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YKEY="_$translate(YKEY,"# '"_"""","~|") ;SCHLÜSSEL ;key if $get(YKEY1)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YKEY1="_$translate(YKEY1," '"_"""","|") ;SCHLÜSSEL1 FÜR LÖSCHEN UND SPEICHERN ;to Delete And Save if $get(YFKEY)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YFKEY="_$translate(YFKEY,"# '"_"""","~|") ;FIX KEYS if $get(YANZ)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YANZ="_YANZ ;ANZEIGE AUS MENU ;Show out of if $get(YOPTION)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YOPTION="_YOPTION ;OPTIONEN if $get(YNAME)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YNAME="_$translate(YNAME," ","_") ;NAME DES FORMS if $get(YSIZE)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YSIZE="_YSIZE ;gRÖßE if $get(YKILL)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YKILL="_YKILL ;LÖSCHMERKER if $get(YBUTTON)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YBUTTON="_YBUTTON ;LETZTER BUTTON ;last if $get(YNUMMER)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YNUMMER="_YNUMMER ;LETZTE LFD NUMMMER (FÜR RÜCKSPRUNG) ;last if $get(YSCREENM)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YSCREENM="_+YSCREENM ;TEST KENNZEICHEN ;Test characteristic if $get(YUSERPROFILE)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YUSERPROFILE="_YUSERPROFILE ;SCREEN FOR USER ;Test if $get(YPRINT)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YPRINT="_YPRINT ;ZIEL WIRD GEDRUCKT ;target if $get(YNOKEY)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YNOKEY="_YNOKEY ;FORMS, DIE BEI RÜCKSPRUNG KEINEN KEY ERHALTEN if $get(YASTART)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YLOCKKILL="_YASTART ; set YLOCKKILL to force lock kill at form load when called from menu if $get(YUSENAME)'="" set strHTML=strHTML_"&YUSENAME="_YUSENAME ; UseMenuDescriptionForForm ;CORE-291 set strHTML = $$FullReplace^COMUtilStr(strHTML,$$$DBLQUOTE,""") ; SR17659 quit strHTML VAR ;SPEICHERN IN YI ;Save within ; ´'` ´´´ ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Add parameter string to ByRef YI string. ; ; History: ; 11-Feb-2011 GRF SR17659: Maintain single construct. Only difference was ; to add YUSERPROFILE which does not appear to have ; been fully implemented and if required would be ; needed in the YI string anyway. ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- set YI=$get(YI)_$$WWWCGI2($$$NO) quit ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; SR17659 : Previous version - can remove after review ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ set YI=$get(YI) if $get(YUCI)'="" set YI=YI_"&YUCI="_YUCI if $get(YBED)'="" set YI=YI_"&YBED="_YBED if $get(YM)'="" set YI=YI_"&YM="_YM if $get(YUSER)'="" set YI=YI_"&YUSER="_YUSER if $get(YTRAKT)'="" set YI=YI_"&YTRAKT="_YTRAKT if $get(YPARA)'="" set YI=YI_"&YPARA="_YPARA if $get(YAENBER)'="" set YI=YI_"&YAENBER="_YAENBER ;PARAMETER ÄNDERUNGSBERECHTIGUNG;DES FORMULARS if $get(YBACK)'="" set YI=YI_"&YBACK="_YBACK if $get(YKEY)'="" set YI=YI_"&YKEY="_$translate(YKEY," '"_"""","|") if $get(YKEY1)'="" set YI=YI_"&YKEY1="_$translate(YKEY1," '"_"""","|") if $get(YFKEY)'="" set YI=YI_"&YFKEY="_$translate(YFKEY," '"_"""","|") if $get(YANZ)'="" set YI=YI_"&YANZ="_YANZ if $get(YOPTION)'="" set YI=YI_"&YOPTION="_YOPTION if $get(YNAME)'="" set YI=YI_"&YNAME="_$translate(YNAME," ","_") if $get(YSIZE)'="" set YI=YI_"&YSIZE="_YSIZE if $get(YKILL)'="" set YI=YI_"&YKILL="_YKILL if $get(YBUTTON)'="" set YI=YI_"&YBUTTON="_YBUTTON if $get(YNUMMER)'="" set YI=YI_"&YNUMMER="_YNUMMER if $get(YSCREENM)'="" set YI=YI_"&YSCREENM="_+YSCREENM if $get(YPRINT)'="" set YI=YI_"&YPRINT="_YPRINT ;ZIEL WIRD GEDRUCKT ;target if $get(YNOKEY)'="" set YI=YI_"&YNOKEY="_YNOKEY if $get(YASTART)'="" set YI=YI_"&YLOCKKILL="_YASTART ; pass flag YLOCKKILL quit VAR1(MANU) ;ALS RETURN VALUE if $get(MANU)=1 new YFORM,YKEY,YBACK ;MAUELLER LINK new YI set YI="" do VAR quit YI
